original_text: Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her. But they are like fat calves that are too weak to fight. They will not stand and fight, but they will turn and run away. Yes, the day of Egypt's punishment has arrived! Their enemy has come to destroy them. Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her. But they are like fat calves that are too weak to fight. They will not stand and fight, but they will turn and run away. Yes, the day of Egypt's punishment has arrived! Their enemy has come to destroy them. Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her. But they are like fat calves that are too weak to fight. They will not stand and fight, but they will turn and run away. Yes, the day of Egypt's punishment has arrived! Their enemy has come to destroy them. Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her.
korean_text: 또 그 중의 고용꾼은 살진 수송아지 같아서 돌이켜 함께 도망하고 서지 못하였나니 재난의 날이 이르렀고 벌 받는 때가 왔음이라

sentences.original_text: Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her.
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽은 자신을 돕기 위해 다른 나라 용병들에게 돈을 지불했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they are like fat calves that are too weak to fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 싸울 힘이 없는 살찬 송아지들과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: They will not stand and fight, but they will turn and run away.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 서서 싸우지 않고, 돌아서서 도망칠 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Yes, the day of Egypt's punishment has arrived!
Their enemy has come to destroy them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 적이 그들을 파괴하기 위해 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Egypt has paid soldiers from other countries to help her.
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽은 자신을 돕기 위해 다른 나라 용병들에게 돈을 지불했습니다.
